name: Transpose
description:
Picking up Ammo increases Ranged damage by 10% for 20s. 
Level 10: Ammo pickups are added directly to the magazine.
unlock: Buy from Dwell or Defeating W.D. 109

name: Feedback
description:
Using this weapon's Mod generates 10% of single charge value as passive Mod Power over 10s. Does not stack.
Level 10: Mod Damage generates 10% of damage dealt as Mod Power.

name: Harmonizer
description:
Increases Mod Damage by 10%. 
Level 10: Generate 25% additional Mod Power for Stowed Weapon.

name: Resentment
description:
Gain 10% Melee Damage when Grey Health is present. 
Level 10: Reduces Stagger by 1 when using any Melee Attack.

name: Shield Breaker
description:
Melee Attacks grant a Shield for 2% of Max Health. Max 20%. Last 10s. 
Level 10: Charged Melee Attacks consume all Shield to increase damage of next strike by 1% per Shield Consumed. Max 100%.

name: Slayer
description:
Reloading increases the damage of this weapon's next shot by 10%. Lasts 3s. 
Level 10: Increases Reload Speed by 15%.

name: Weaponlord
description:
Basic Melee Attack increase the next Charge Attack by 7%. Max 5 Stacks. 
Level 10: At Max Stacks, the next Charge Attack gains 100% Critical Chance.

name: Dervish
description:
Increases Melee Damage by 20% for 10s when activating a Skill. 
Level 10: Melee kills reduce Skill Cooldowns by 5%. Can trigger once every 5s.

name: Deadly Calm
description:
Continuosly Aiming increases Ranged Damage by up to 10% over 3s. 
Level 10: Ranged Critical Hit Chance increased by 10%.

name: Battery
description:
Ranged Hits increase the next Weakspot Hit by 10% per stack. Max 5 Stacks. 
Level 10: At Max Stacks, the next Weakspot Hit deals 15% additional damage over 3s.

name: Timewave
description:
Mod Use applies SLOW status on all enemies within 7.5m for 3.5s.
Level 10: Increase this weapon's Ranged damage by 15% to enemies inflicted with SLOW status.

name: Refunder
description:
Shots from this weapon have 20% chance to return spent Ammo to reserves.
Level 10: Refunded Ammo has a 50% chance to also be added to stowed weapon reserves.

name: Momentum
description:
When this weapon scores a Critical hit, it increases Critical Chance and Critical Damage by 1.5% for 3s. Max 10 stacks.
Level 10: Critical Hits from this weapon add 2 stacks. Increases duration by 2s.

name: Lithely
description:
Increase this weapon's Reload Speed by 4% for each enemy killed between reloads. Lasts 15s. Max 5 Stacks.
Level 10: Reloading at Max Stacks increases Ranged Damage by 20% for 15s.

name: Striker
description:
Melee Hits increase Melee Damage by 3% for 10s. Max 5 Stacks.
Level 10: Increases Movement Speed by 3% per stack.

name: Extender
description:
Increases Magazine Capacity of this weapon by 30%.
Level 10: Increases Reload Speed of this weapon by 15%

name: Bandit
description:
On hit, grants 10% chanche to return spent Ammo directly into the magazine of this weapon.
Level 10: When Ammo is returned to this weapon, it gains 10% increased Fire Rate for 3s. Duration can increase up to 10s
unlock: Defeat The Weald Stalker and The Gnarled Archer killed in this order

name: Reinvigorate
description:
Reduces Stamina Cost of all Charged Melee Attacks by 25%.
Level 10: Melee Charge Attacks gain 15% additional damage and 10% Critical Chance.
unlock: Defeat Defiler Boss that spawns after killing Nexus Root with the imprissioned Pan
